channel.title: [PI] Weapons Not in right equitment Slot HELP
channel.description:
ok here my problem i just add arcane stream necky and staff of light client sided and server sided but when i go to wear them both go to my head im really new to adding items please help heres a picture of whats happening
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/5mges.jpg[/img]

item.title: [PI] Weapons Not in right equitment Slot HELP
item.dc:creator: @faze1one faze1one
item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

[quote=“EpicScapePkz, post:5, topic:356061”][quote author=faze1one link=topic=452601.msg3316306#msg3316306 date=1282341318]

You have to add the id in the correct spot in item.java

Client or server sidied? Please help

server
[/quote]

Still doesnt work there still in there[/quote]

idk then srry im still new to PI

Read full topic
